name: Brazilian Bundle Deals
description:
Brazilian hair is silkier and shinier than Malaysian hair. Itâ€™s available in all textures. Our natural wave hair tends to be wavy at the end. Also, it holds curls longer and better than processed Remy hair. 
This hair is light, silky and easy to manage. It comes in natural straight or gentle wave textures and usually comes in dark shades. It comes with cuticles intact and in the same direction, so there is virtually no tangling or matting. 

-Grade 5A
-Unprocessed
-Can be dyed. Comes in natural black.   

ALLOW 5-7 DAYS FOR PROCESSING ON ALL BUNDLE DEALS.

name: Peruvian Bundle Deals
description:
Peruvian hair is a little coarser and thicker than Malaysian or Brazilian hair, making it appear more natural on normal African American relaxed hair. The curly texture becomes curler when wet or washed. 

-Grade 5A
-Unprocessed
-Can be dyed. Comes in natural black.
-100 gram (3.5 oz. - 4 oz.) bundles.  

ALLOW 5-7 DAYS FOR PROCESSING ON ALL BUNDLE DEALS.

name: Indian Natural Wave
description:
If you like to style your hair straight most of the time and enjoy having light gentle waves once in a while, our Indian natural wave virgin hair is your right choice. Indian hair typically has a slight wavy pattern, but can be flat ironed quickly for an ultra sleek straight look. When the hair is washed and air dried, it regains its natural gentle wave. 

The virgin Indian natural wave hair is less coarse than the Brazilian and Malaysian hair while still maintaining its luster and shine.Like all of our virgin hair, this gorgeous hair has not been mixed with synthetic hair fibers or hair from different origins. Hair is double drawn with cuticles intact to prevent tangling and shedding problems.


14" ~ $60
16" ~ $70
18" ~ $80
20" ~ $90
22" ~ $100

-Unprocessed
-Can be dyed. Comes in natural black.

description:
Our Malaysian virgin hair is 100% pure virgin hair, this is one of the best textures in our collection. This hair is very manageable and has staying power. Our Malaysian bundles are considered a luxury product because of the difficulty to find and supreme quality. It is very soft, shiny and curls effortlessly. This hair also blends very well with African- American, Hispanic, and Caucasian hair types.

name: Lace Front Closures 3"x4"
description:
Want to look as if hair is growing from your scalp? Tired of trying to blend your natural hair in with your expensive virgin weaving hair, in order to cover up tracks?

 Is your natural hair becoming brittle and unhealthy by over processing? Want to be able to able to comb your hair in any style, whether it is a part on the side, a part in the middle, twists in the front, or  a pony tail straight back?

If you answer yes to 1 of these questions, than lace closures are definitely for you. Silk base lace closure is a closure that is worn with a weave to give a natural looking hair line; the Silk Base material creates a scalp for this closure, and therefore can be parted and styled in any matter.

Unfortunately our silk closures are only available in the body wave texture. But just like our other textures, these silk based closures can be straighten without any hassle.

14" ~ $85

-Grade 5A
-Unprocessed
-Can be dyed. Comes in natural black.
-40 grams

name: Lace Frontals 13"x4"
description:
Our Mane Attraktionz lace frontals cover a larger area (13"x4") oppose to a regular lace closer (4"x3"), as they will have a temple to temple hairline. This larger temple to temple area in combination with the replication of a natural hairline allows for many off the face type of hairstyles that are not possible with a regular closure. Our lace frontal piece has a realistic hairline which is meant to mimic hair growing from the scalp and is meant to be bonded in place.

Our lace frontal are installed with sealed knots to help keep the hair secured firmly in the cap. Frontals will also require some minor work to achieve a natural appearance. (Bleaching knots, the addition of a of a flesh colored fabric under will help to add the look of a natural scalp to a frontal) 

Due to the delicate nature of the materials in which our lace frontals are constructed from, the may have a lifespan of 3-12 months depending on a variety of factors that contribute care and wear of the hair piece.

name: Hair Samples
description:
Here at Mane Attraktionz, we give our clients the opportunity to purchase sample wefts of grade 4A virgin hair. These samples are usually 10-12 inches in length and approx. 2 inches of weft. By purchasing a sample weft, you will have an idea of the texture and feel of the hair that you choose.

Samples are available in:

    Brazilian Body Wave
    Brazilian Straight
    Brazilian Deep Wave
    Brazilian Natural Wave
    Peruvian Body Wave
    Indian Natural Wave
    Malaysian Loose Wave

Only a maximum of 2 wefts can be shipped per customer.
